mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT b.item_name, b.meeting_time, m.content, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY m.participant_id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC) AS date_rank FROM participants p JOIN messages m ON p.id = m.participant_id JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id WHERE p.organizer_id = uid AND b.is_finished = false) WHERE TRUE AND date_rank = 1;
